45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Sulaiman Taimi with the same chain of transmitters but with a variation of words (and that is):" By Allah, let that accompany us not which has been damned, or he said like it

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ لَعْنِ الدَّوَابِّ، وَغَيْرِهَا،
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Cursing Animals Etc.
